movies.title: Jupiter Ascending
movies.summary: A young woman discovers her destiny as an heiress of intergalactic nobility and must fight to protect the inhabitants of Earth from an ancient and destructive industry.

movies.title: Focus
movies.summary: Nicky Spurgeon is an extremely accomplished con man who takes an amateur con artist, Jess, under his wing. Nicky and Jess become romantically involved, and with Nicky’s profession of being a liar and a cheater for a living, he realizes that deception and love are things that don’t go together. They split, only to see each other three years later… And things get messy.

movies.title: Night at the Museum: Secret of the Tomb
movies.summary: Larry spans the globe, uniting favorite and new characters while embarking on an epic quest to save the magic before it is gone forever.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.summary: A group of explorers make use of a newly discovered wormhole to surpass the limitations on human space travel and conquer the vast distances involved in an interstellar voyage.

movies.title: The Interview
movies.summary: Dave Skylark and producer Aaron Rapoport run the celebrity tabloid show “Skylark Tonight.” When they land an interview with a surprise fan, North Korean dictator Kim Jong-un, they are recruited by the CIA to turn their trip to Pyongyang into an assassination mission.

movies.title: The Theory of Everything
movies.summary: A look at the relationship between the famous physicist Stephen Hawking and his wife.

movies.title: The Maze Runner
movies.summary: Thomas is deposited in a community of boys after his memory is erased, soon learning they’re all trapped in a maze that will require him to join forces with fellow “runners” for a shot at escape.

movies.title: Dawn of the Planet of the Apes
movies.summary: Ten years after a pandemic disease, apes who have survived it are drawn into battle with a group of human survivors.

movies.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
movies.summary: When a kingpin threatens New York City, a news reporter find a quad of mutants which makes an alliance to unravel Shredder’s plan as the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles.

movies.title: Project Almanac
movies.summary: A group of teens discover secret plans of a time machine, and construct one. However, things start to get out of control.

movies.title: Furious Seven
movies.summary: Deckard Shaw seeks revenge against Dominic Toretto and his family for his comatose brother.
